meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inscrutable.
meanings.sent1: Her inscrutablenesses puzzled everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The inscrutablenesses of the ancient artifact left historians baffled.
meanings.sent3: The inscrutablenesses of the cat's behavior made the family laugh.
meanings.sent4: His inscrutablenesses were like a locked chest, hiding his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The inscrutablenesses of the maze made it impossible to find the way out.

meanings.definition: The inability to be understood or analyzed.
meanings.sent1: The inscrutablenesses of the math problem stumped the students.
meanings.sent2: She felt frustrated by the inscrutablenesses of his actions.
meanings.sent3: The inscrutablenesses of the recipe resulted in a funny cooking disaster.
meanings.sent4: The inscrutablenesses of the storm clouds hinted at an impending thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: His inscrutablenesses in poker always kept his opponents guessing.
